comments:
Hi,
Am using Eclipse 3.0.1.When I launch Eclipse,I get NPE.Hence, am unable to 
launch Eclipse.

I'm using HP-UX. There was a similar bug raised with the Id#28785, which 
stated that the bug was fixed in 2.1 release.But still the error persists.I 
could not reply to the budId#28785.Hence I'm creating it as a new bug.

Rgds,
Roopa

Here is the log file that is generated:
